version_description:
• Hilton Honors members can now use nearly ANY combination of Points and money to book their stay, starting at 5,000 Points. Just toggle on “Use Hilton Honors Points” and look for the option to pay with Points & Money when you’re booking.
• We’ve made lots of small tweaks to keep the app running smoothly.

• It's easier to find your favorite hotels for future visits. Just tap the heart next to the hotel name, and we'll save it to the favorites list under your account.
• You can now choose your earning style preference: Points and Points, or Points and Miles with 60+ travel partners.
• As always, we're working away at making the Hilton Honors app a faster, smoother, easier experience than ever before.
• View your stay benefits now after you book from the Stays section

• Our new Notification Center widget shows you your account and reservation info without even opening the app.
• No more wondering where the ice machines are: you can view hotel maps from the time you book on through check-out.
• We're always streamlining the Hilton Honors app for greater efficiency and speed.

• Tap the navigation section to go back to the main screen of each section, no matter where you are in the app.
• Keep your room number private – and memorable. Rename your room on your Digital Key screen.
• We’re constantly working on the Hilton Honors app. You’ll find a faster, smoother, and easier experience with every update.
•We’re constantly working on the Hilton Honors app. You’ll find a faster, smoother, and easier experience with every update.

• Hilton Honors members traveling to the UK can get to their room even faster by providing travel information prior to arrival. Now available when using Digital Key!
• We’re constantly working on the Hilton Honors app. You’ll find a faster, smoother, and easier experience with every update.

• Shake, shake, shake! Open your Digital Key with the shake of your phone.
• Find your way faster! Digital Key now shows your room's floor and building.
• Beautiful pictures for future stays are back by popular demand!
• Picking the perfect room is faster than ever with some performance enhancements.
• As always, we've fine-tuned many things to deliver the best experience possible.
• We’re always fine-tuning everything to deliver the best experience possible.

• Checking in? Now you can choose from a wider selection of available rooms.
• You can now reply directly to messages from your hotel right from the notification.
• Other small tweaks and updates. Digital housekeeping, basically.

• Checking in? Now you can choose from a wider selection of available rooms.
• You can now reply directly to messages from your hotel right from the notification.
• Other small tweaks and updates. Digital housekeeping, basically.

• Forget to get Digital Key before your stay? You can now opt in at any point during your stay.
• We’ve made some improvements to the app to make it even faster.

• Forget to get Digital Key before your stay? You can now opt in at any point during your stay.
• We’ve made some improvements to the app to make it even faster.

• Forget to get Digital Key before your stay? You can now opt in at any point during your stay.
• We’ve made some improvements to the app to make it even faster.

• Forget to get Digital Key before your stay? You can now opt in at any point during your stay.
• We’ve made some improvements to the app to make it even faster.

• We have updated our picks for Local Scenes to reflect the hottest restaurants and nightlife.
• Other small tweaks and updates. Digital housekeeping, basically.
• We gave the app a few tweaks to keep it humming along nicely.

• We’re always working behind the scenes to give you the best experience in the app – and in the hotel. With improvements and innovative features always in the works, every update makes Hilton Honors the ideal travel companion.

• We’ve added a tracker so you can see your progress towards our brand new Milestone Bonuses!
